price: 59. Dan janganlah orang-orang kafir mengira, bahwa mereka akan dapat lolos (dari kekuasaan Allah). Sungguh, mereka tidak dapat melemahkan (Allah).
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
